p: Addition of oregano and cinnamon essential oils to field peas decreased the protein fractionation significantly after 60 day ensilage process [ 5]. In another study, addition of cinnamon leaf extract to barley silage at different quantities caused an increase at CP amount [ 3]. These results were found to be similar to the oregano and cinnamon essential oil of Soycan-Önenç et al [ 5], as well as to cinnamon extract of Chaves et al [ 3].
